tweet: Americans should be able to trust their government to keep their info safe. That's why I'm proud @RepRobinKelly & my bill to help keep the vast data stored by the federal government secure from hackers passed unanimously out of the House today. Learn more: https://hurd.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/hurd-kellys-bipartisan-it-bill-passes-house …

And they say bipartisanship is dead... I'm proud my colleagues could come together today to unanimously pass my bill to ensure our federal government has a Federal CIO to oversee the security of our digital infrastructure and keep Americans' information safe. pic.twitter.com/P6kkvh7ujd
The only way we can get ahead of the curve and defend our digital infrastructure is with a national AI strategy #CHCITechSummit #TechTuesday pic.twitter.com/sRBM2JcqAW
